Okay I believe that Momoiro mentioned that it is [not] LIKELY that 
their will be a sequel to NHK's Shinsengumi!....but some people want 
to make it happen :)
please use http://www.nifty.com/globalgate
http://www.hino-shinsengumi.com/01kikan_gentei/sorekara/index.html
(again) I'm -not- 100% clear on this...but my impression is that it 
is a petition to dramatize Hijikata's journey to Hakodate

[for those who collect Chibi Shinsengumi]
finally, it is about time we have chibi Shimada Kai 
http://www.hino-shinsengumi.com/13katudo/data/shima001.jpg

chibi Saitou!!!
